bug.author: zhreshold
bug.summary: Missing best config after fit for object detection fit example
bug.description:
After executing object detection example, it only produces: <denchmark-code>INFO:autogluon.task.object_detection.object_detection:>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> finish model fitting INFO:autogluon.task.object_detection.object_detection:The best config: </denchmark-code>
while no best config is reported. Might relate to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/autogluon/issues/29>#29</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks for catching that. have fixed it in a new PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/autogluon/pull/126>#126</denchmark-link> .
